english.segment1: VERSE(1): The splendor of a King, Clothed in majesty. Let all the earth rejoice, All the earth rejoice. He wraps himself in light, And darkness tries to hide. And trembles at his voice, And trembles at his voice
english.segment2: CHORUS(1): How great is our God, sing with me. How great is our God, and all who sing. How great, How great. Is our God
english.segment3: VERSE(2): Age to age he stands. And time is in His Hands. Beginning and the End, Beginning and the End. The Godhead, Three in one. Father, Spirit, Son. The Lion and the Lamb, The Lion and the Lamb
english.segment4: CHORUS(1): How great is our God, sing with me. How great is our God, and all who sing. How great, How great. Is our God
english.segment5: CHORUS(2). Name above all names. You are Worthy of all praise. and My heart will sing how great. Is our God. (x2)
english.segment6: CHORUS(1): How great is our God, Sing with me. How great is our God, and all who sing. How great, How great. Is our God
english.segment7: . CHORUS(1): How great is our God, Sing with me. How great is our God, and who sing. How great, How great. Is our God
